$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.text:
Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Fishing Manual|https://oflg.github.io/fishing/]].

可在 [[钓鱼手册|https://oflg.github.io/fishing/]] 查看安装使用教程。

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/action-fishing.j.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/action-fishing.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editortoolbar/setcloze
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.caption: <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setcloze]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setcloze]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.text:
\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always

<$action-sendmessage
    $message="tm-edit-text-operation"
    $param="save-selection"
    tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
    field="save-selection"
/>

<$list
    filter="[<targetTiddler>]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler=<<targetTiddler>>
                draft.title={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!save-selection}!is[blank]]~[<targetTiddler>get[draft.title]]}}}
                caption="{{||Cloze}}"
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editortoolbar/setexcerpt
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.caption: <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setexcerpt]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setexcerpt]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.text:
\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always

<$action-sendmessage
    $message="tm-edit-text-operation"
    $param="save-selection"
    tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
    field="save-selection"
/>

<$list
    filter="[<targetTiddler>]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-setfield
                draft.title={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!save-selection}!is[blank]]~[<targetTiddler>get[draft.title]]}}}
                interval={{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}}
                due={{{[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}due[]]}}}
                caption="{{||Excerpt}}"
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/addfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$reveal
        default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]is[missing]]}}}
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
        animate="yes"
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[pinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[pinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[pinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[pinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;"
        >
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}}
                type="application/json"
            />
            {{$:/core/images/new-button}}
        </$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/commonfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]count[]]}}} type="gt" text="0" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;width:auto;height:auto;" > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]sort[title]]" variable="fishingrod" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fishingrod=<> /> <$text text={{{[addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]get[caption]]~[]}}}/>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/deletefilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$reveal
        default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]is[missing]]}}}
        type="match"
        text=""
        animate="yes"
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible"
            style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;"
        >
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                fishingrod=""
            />
            {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
        </$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/setfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]is[missing]]}}} type="match" text="" animate="yes" >
<$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" fish="" /> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setalias]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setalias]]}}}/>
<$edit-text tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} field="caption" placeholder={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[typealias]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[typealias]]}}} tag="input"/>
<$let autoorder="[sort[due]reverse[]sortsub:numberreverse[]]" dueorder="[sort[due]]" createdorder="[sort[created]]" > <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setorder]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setorder]]}}}/> <$list filter="due undue new" variable="pondname" >
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/> <$select tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} index={{{[addsuffix[order]]}}} default={{{[match[due]then]~[match[undue]then]~[match[new]then]}}} > <$list filter="autoorder dueorder createdorder" variable="pondorder" >

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/due.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/due.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/excisefish.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/excisefish.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.text:
<$reveal default={{{[tag[?]][has[due]][match{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >
<$reveal state=<> type="match" text="hide" animate="yes" > <> <$list filter="[[?]][all[current]tags[]sort[title]]-[all[current]backlinks[]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop" />
<$reveal state="$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold-bar" type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" default="show" retain="yes" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Caption}} class="tc-fold-banner" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-fold-tiddler" $param=<> foldedState=<> /> {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="show" default="show" retain="yes" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Caption}} class="tc-unfold-banner" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-fold-tiddler" $param=<> foldedState=<> /> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.text:
<$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="hide" animate="yes" > ---
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}}
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="learn forget remember grasp" variable="ease" > <$reveal default={{{[has[grade]then[review]else[learnnew]]}}} type="match" text={{{[match[learn]then[learnnew]else[review]]}}} animate="yes" > <$let easetip={{{[addsuffix[tip]]}}} > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style={{{[match[learn]then[margin-left:10px;color:green;]]~[match[forget]then[margin-left:10px;color:red;]]~[match[remember]then[margin-left:10px;color:green;]]~[match[grasp]then[margin-left:10px;color:blue;]]}}} > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="?" /> <$reveal default={{{[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]}}} type="match" text="" animate="yes" > <$action-fishing $grade={{{[match[learn]then[learn]]~[match[forget]then[0]]~[match[remember]then[1]]~[match[grasp]then[2]]}}} /> <$reveal default={{{[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$action-setfield interval={{{[get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}subtract[1]]+[add[1]]}}} due={{{[get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}subtract[1]]+[add[1]due[]]}}} /> <$list filter="[tags[]]:intersection[backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]" variable="backexcerpt" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $timestamp="no" interval={{{[match[learn]then[0]]~[match[forget]then[1]]~[match[remember]then[0]]~[match[grasp]then[-1]][get[interval]]+[sum[]]}}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/> <$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="margin-left:10px;" > ⁝ <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="aboveleft" animate="yes" >
<$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discardtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discardtip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discardtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discardtip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-deletefield due interval difficulty stability retrievability lapses reps review /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discard]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discard]]}}}/> <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add7tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add7tip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add7tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add7tip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-setfield due={{{[[7]due[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> + 7 <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add1tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add1tip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add1tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add1tip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-setfield due={{{[[1]due[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> + 1

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.caption: {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishing]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishing]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.text:
<$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingtip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingtip]]}}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" > {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}} {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.text:
<$let
    defaultgrod="[tag[?]]"
    due="[has[due]]-[has[due]!days:due[1]]"
    undue="[has[due]!days:due[1]]"
    new="[!has[due]]"
    autoorder="[sort[due]reverse[]sortsub:number<priority>reverse[]]"
    dueorder="[sort[due]]"
    createdorder="[sort[created]]"
>
    <$list
        filter="due undue new"
        variable="pondname"
    >
        <$let
            pondordername={{{[<pondname>addsuffix[order]]}}}
            fishingrod={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}!is[blank]else<defaultgrod>]}}}
            fishingpond={{{[<pondname>match[due]then<due>]~[<pondname>match[undue]then<undue>]~[<pondname>match[new]then<new>]}}}
            fishingorder={{{[<fishingrod>addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex<pondordername>]~[<pondname>match[due]then<autoorder>]~[<pondname>match[undue]then<dueorder>]~[<pondname>match[new]then<createdorder>]}}}
        >
            <$button
                tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
                aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
                class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"
                style="padding-right:10px;"
            >
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                    text=""
                    type=""
                    fishingrod=<<fishingrod>>
                    fishingpond=<<fishingpond>>
                    fishingorder=<<fishingorder>>
                    fish={{{[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>subfilter<fishingorder>first[]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                    text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
                />
                <$action-navigate
                    $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
                />
                <$action-popup
                    $state=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingdeck">>
                    $coords=""
                />
                <$text
                    text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex<pondname>]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex<pondname>]}}}
                /><$count
                    filter="[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>]"
                />
            </$button>
        </$let>
    </$list>
</$let>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.text:
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" field="fishingrod" tag="input" focus="true" placeholder="[tag[?]]" inputActions='<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fish=""/>' />
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/fishingrod/Button]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>

>

      font-weight="bold"

      font-size="24"
      id="svg_5"

      x="26.8242"
      stroke-width="0"

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.text:
\define priority() [get[caption]search-replace::regexp[{{\|\|(.*)}}],[$1]tag[$:/tags/QuestionTemplate]count[]]=[get[due]interval[]]=[backlinks[]count[]]=[links[]has[due]count[]negate[]]=[links[]has[due]!days:due[1]count[]]+[sum[]add{!!priority}]

\define fishbreadcrumbs()
<$let
    currentTiddler={{{[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[first[]]}}}
>
    <$reveal
        default=<<currentTiddler>>
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
    >
        <<fishbreadcrumbs>>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal
        default=<<currentTiddler>>
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
    >
        {{||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} >
    </$reveal>
</$let>
\end

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/styles.css.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/styles.css

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-for.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-forget
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-for.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}match{$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler}has[retrievability]]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$list
            filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]"
        >
            <$fieldmangler>
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-add-tag"
                    $param="?"
                />
                <$action-fishing
                    $grade="0"
                />
                <$list
                    filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]"
                    variable="backexcerpt"
                >
                    <$action-setfield
                        $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                        $timestamp="no"
                        interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[1]]}}}
                    />
                </$list>
                <$action-deletetiddler
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                    text=""
                    type=""
                    fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                    text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
                />
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-close-tiddler"
                />
                <$action-navigate
                    $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
                />
            </$fieldmangler>
        </$list>
    </$navigator>
</$reveal>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-gra.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-grasp
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-gra.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}match{$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler}has[retrievability]]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$list
            filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]"
        >
            <$fieldmangler>
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-add-tag"
                    $param="?"
                />
                <$action-fishing
                    $grade="2"
                />
                <$list
                    filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]"
                    variable="backexcerpt"
                >
                    <$action-setfield
                        $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                        $timestamp="no"
                        interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[-1]]}}}
                    />
                </$list>
                <$action-deletetiddler
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                    text=""
                    type=""
                    fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                    text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
                />
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-close-tiddler"
                />
                <$action-navigate
                    $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
                />
            </$fieldmangler>
        </$list>
    </$navigator>
</$reveal>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-lea.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-learn
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-lea.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}match{$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler}has[retrievability]]}}}
    type="match"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$list
            filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]"
        >
            <$fieldmangler>
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-add-tag"
                    $param="?"
                />
                <$reveal
                    default={{{[<currentTiddler>search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]}}}
                    type="match"
                    text=""
                    animate="yes"
                >
                    <$action-fishing
                        $grade="learn"
                    />
                </$reveal>
                <$reveal
                    default={{{[<currentTiddler>search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]}}}
                    type="nomatch"
                    text=""
                    animate="yes"
                >
                    <$action-setfield
                        interval={{{[<currentTiddler>get[interval]]~[[0]]+[add[1]]}}}
                        due={{{[<currentTiddler>get[interval]]~[[0]]+[add[1]due[]]}}}
                    />
                </$reveal>
                <$list
                    filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]"
                    variable="backexcerpt"
                >
                    <$action-setfield
                        $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                        $timestamp="no"
                        interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[0]]}}}
                    />
                </$list>
                <$action-deletetiddler
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                    text=""
                    type=""
                    fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                    text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
                />
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-close-tiddler"
                />
                <$action-navigate
                    $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
                />
            </$fieldmangler>
        </$list>
    </$navigator>
</$reveal>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-rem.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-remember
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-rem.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}match{$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler}has[retrievability]]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$list
            filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]"
        >
            <$fieldmangler>
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-add-tag"
                    $param="?"
                />
                <$action-fishing
                    $grade="1"
                />
                <$list
                    filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]]"
                    variable="backexcerpt"
                >
                    <$action-setfield
                        $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                        $timestamp="no"
                        interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[0]]}}}
                    />
                </$list>
                <$action-deletetiddler
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                    text=""
                    type=""
                    fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
                />
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                    text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
                />
                <$action-sendmessage

                    $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}

        </$list>

</$reveal>

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing/fishing
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.caption: <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishing]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishing]]}}}/>
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.text:
|<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setrecall]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setrecall]]}}}/> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data" field="requestRecall" placeholder="0.9" tag="input"/>
@@color:red;font-size:10px;<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setrecalltip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setrecalltip]]}}}/>@@ | |<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setinterval]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setinterval]]}}}/> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data" field="requestInterval" placeholder="1" tag="input"/>

Cloze.title: Cloze
Cloze.text: <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="nomatch" text=<> animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="gteq" text="3" animate="yes" > <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]]" variable="titleitem" counter="counter" > <$reveal default={{{[remainder[2]]}}} type="nomatch" text="0" > <> <$reveal default={{{[remainder[2]]}}} type="match" text="0" > <$let clozeid=<> clozecontent=<> clozecontent={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]thenelse[` `]]}}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" $index=<> $value={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]then[]else[show]]}}} /> <> <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="lt" text="3" animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > {{!!title}}

Excerpt.title: Excerpt
Excerpt.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$text
        text={{{[{!!text}split[]limit[13]join[]addsuffix[...]]}}}
    />
</$reveal>
<$reveal
    default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
    type="match"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    {{!!title}}
</$reveal>

Question.title: Question
Question.text: {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$edit tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} minHeight="15px" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" > <$set value=<> name="targetTiddler" > <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" style="display: none;" > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" > <$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" > <$transclude/> <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > <$diff-text source={{$:/temp/fishing}} dest={{!!text}} />
